The R package **bcscr** exposes some of the larger functions and R6 objects that appear in the online textbook [Beginning Computer Science with R](https://homerhanumat.github.io/r-notes).

## Installation

Install the package from Git Hub:

```{r eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("homerhanumat/bcscr")
```

Then attach the package:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(bcscr)
```


Enjoy!
